function_body:
git add -A
  git commit -qm "CLEAN POINT"
  git reset HEAD~1 --hard
  git clean -f -d

git init
  gi osx >> .gitignore
  echo "READ.ME" >> README.md
  gcommit "Initial"
  if test -n ${@}
    gconnect $repo_uri
    git push -u origin master
  end

git add -A
  if test -n "${@}"
        git commit -m "${@}"
    else
        git commit -m "WIP"
    end

set merge_branch (git symbolic-ref HEAD | sed -e "s,.*/\(.*\),\1,")
  git checkout master
  gpull
  git rebase -i master
  git merge $merge_branch

git rm -r --cached .
  git add .
  git commit -am "Remove ignored files"

set merge_branch (git symbolic-ref HEAD | sed -e "s,.*/\(.*\),\1,")
 git merge -s ours master
  git checkout master
  git merge $merge_branch
